segments.text: I have a spasm of nausea and dizziness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever suffered from airsickness before ? You're probably airsick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , this is the first time on a plane . Maybe you are right .. Please get me some pills .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I will get some for you . There's an airsickness bag behind the seat in front of you.Please wait me for a moment . ( Go away for a few minutes , and now she comes back . ) Here are two pills . And the water is in the glass too.Please take the pills with water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . ( Take the pills . )
segments.speaker: S2
